HotelElement.Name: DoubleTree by Hilton London - Tower Of London

Description.Text: Please note hotel offers full English Breakfast.

DoubleTree by Hilton - Tower of London is ideally located next to the River Thames, The Tower of London and Tower Bridge. A short walk away from the hotel is the heart of The City of London; the Square Mile with the Gherkin Tower. This area is surrounded by famous landmarks such as St Paul's Catherdal, the Barbican,Monument, Camden (famous for it's markets) and Brick Lane (widely renowned for it's Indian cuisine and bagel shops), which are all easily accessible from City Inn Tower of London.DoubleTree by Hilton Tower of London is situated a few minutes walk from Tower Hill and Fenchurch Street station this hotel is perfectly positioned for easy access to London's historic center as well as the business hub.

The hotel has 583 guest rooms and some of them are fully accessible to wheelchair user. As guest bedrooms feature an iMac entertainment system offering a personal computer with free high-speed internet access, video conferencing, Skype and satellite/terrestrial TV channels and radio stations.Power showers, (in our suites baths are additionally available), luxury toiletries and dressing gowns are available in all of our bathrooms and a mini-bar, tea and coffee making facilities, iron and ironing board and a hairdryer are present in all of our guest rooms for customer use. Guests can control the temperature of their rooms with air conditioning as well as being able to open their windows for a blast of fresh air. Heating can also be controlled so that the room environment can be controlled to suit your own body, aiding a good night's sleep.
This is a modern purpose built 12 storey contemporary building with large windows being a prominent factor.

City Cafe will bring a welcomed dining alternative to EC3 whether for business or pleasure. Our destination restaurant will provide a perfect backdrop for a private dinner, business lunch or celebration with swift service and knowledgeable staff. Menus will present classic favorites as well as modern twists on British cuisine. Every week our renowned Head Chef , Jonathan Ingram,will create his own market menu using the freshest ingredients, sourced locally where possible. A seasonal a la carte menu will also be served using quality produce and served at a reasonable price, complimented by a wide selection of fine wines. Also on the ground floor our Fenchurch Lounge bar will be a perfect place to gather pre or post meal as well as serving as fitting environment to catch up with friends and work colleagues. An extensive wine list and whiskey library is available and an imaginative selection of cocktails to enjoy whilst people watching in this vibrant area. SkyLounge is set to become one of the most popular destinations for meeting with friends and work colleagues in London. The SkyLounge has been specifically designed to engage with the skyline of the City of London offering spectacular views over the business district, Tower Bridge and the River Thames.
The lobby is large, modern and open plan. The huge floor to ceiling windows envelop the front and around the entrance, creating huge amounts of natural light.
